name: Place 1
title: CSK wins the Ipl final for the 5th time against GT at Gujrat
description: Chennai Super Kings vs Gujarat Titans, IPL 2023 Final Highlights: Ravindra Jadeja finished in MS Dhoni style as he hit a six and a four off the last 2 balls to take Chennai Super Kings to their 5th Indian Premier League title in a rain-curtailed match on Monday.
